Good Comments: Nobody complained when "mamono" was translated as "demon" in in the also-KEY-based Kanon 02/06 anime.
They incorrectly translated "mamono" as daemon, rather than "familiar", which is the more accurate and original translation.
Memecartel in action. If you are stupid enough to understand original dialogues, go ahead and use this subs, if not, go with chihiro.
Bad Comments: More accurately translating "mamono" gets downvotes xfd
Liberal made up shit, with multiple errors. They changed the tone of dialogues, and "translated" mamono as a monster, which is absurd (bakemono or obake =monster)
